Message:
I’ve been modeling myself
after that witch since
the day we met.

She had an eyepatch,
and her hair was...long?
Yeah, long...

I copied her look and
tried to talk the way she did.

I think she was saying
something about the stars too...

Ah, I remember!
The “Sovereign of the Stars.”
That was it!

Perfect!
From this day onward,
I’ll be Sovereign of the Stars!

Everyone else thinks
I’m some kind of
stupid eccentric,

because none of them
know the truth.

BUT...that’s fine with me.
Friends are but frivolous
when one serves a higher cause!

That’s right!
For I am Sovereign of the Stars—
Witness of the World!

Solitude suits me perfectly.
I’m not lonely in the slightest.

Heroes don’t need anyone
but themselves, after all.
